module.name: iSymphonyV3
module.description: This module automatically configures the operator panel to reflect the PBX configuration.
module.changelog: *4.1.11* Fixes issue with display when editing extensions *4.1.10* Fixes for 13 *4.1.9* Depreciate old hooks *4.1.8* FREEPBX-9953 Core requires userman *4.1.7* FREEPBX-9781 Fix fatal class errors in 13 *4.1.6* Fatal error fix in installer *4.1.4* Use displayname if exists, else use first,last name *4.1.3* Username change support *4.1.2* Use branding file *4.1.1* Support password reset and email ability through userman *3.1.9* Fix userman hook
